column4: hi - looking for install help. I'm installing Crunchbang 8.10 which is Ubuntu-based (a temporary install - I know it and have the disk handy).
When I get to "Prepare Partitions" the list is empty and the buttons underneath are greyed out. yet if I run gparted, it detects my partitions no problem. Ideas?
really this channal is for Ubuntu support not other distros
I know - Crunchbang is really Ubuntu with a different desktop.
